A martial-arts classic from the prolific Hua Shan, Disciples of Shaolin Temple is a brutal tale of revenge, redemption, and serious bodily harm. When the master of the temple refuses the man's challenge, the disgraced student turns his attention towards the current disciples, including the newly arrived Yipeng.

Reiko Haruna, a prize-winning author suffering from writer's-block, moves to an isolated house in the countryside. One night she sees a man in a storage room transporting an ancient mummy. She finds out the man is an archaeologist securing his...

Reiko Haruna, a prize-winning author suffering from writer's-block, moves to an isolated house in the countryside. One night she sees a man in a storage room transporting an ancient mummy. She finds out the man is an archaeologist securing his latest discovery, and the two form a friendship. Reiko allows the man to hide the mummy in her house, but soon begins noticing strange things happening around the place. This is not helped by the appearance of a ghost who starts visiting her late at night.

Visually stunning, bursting with action, desire and sexual tension, this is the mad journey of a rebellious princess who falls from grace and is forced to work at a brothel. A seductive adaptation of the classic kabuki play, PRINCESS SAKURA follows the willful princess as she takes up work at a brothel in the hopes of meeting the man she fell in love with the night he assaulted her. Meanwhile, that man is himself on the run from assassins after his theft of a precious scroll.

When a middle-aged woman is killed by a member of a delinquent karaoke gang, her friends choose to strike back. The karaoke gang attacks the women in retaliation, prompting further and increasingly absurd turns of violence. Conjured from the mind...

When a middle-aged woman is killed by a member of a delinquent karaoke gang, her friends choose to strike back. The karaoke gang attacks the women in retaliation, prompting further and increasingly absurd turns of violence. Conjured from the mind of Ryu Murakami, KARAOKE TERROR is a vicious and venomous tale of escalating revenge set against an undeniable soundtrack of 40s and 50s karaoke hits.

One of the top horror titles to come out of Thailand in recent memory, "Slice" plays out like a twisted mix of "Silence of the Lambs" and "Se7en." A gruesome serial killer is on the loose, preying on the rich and influential, exposing their sexual proclivities, dismembering them and randomly dumping their severed body parts. With the son of a prominent politician in danger, the law turns to notorious ex-hitman Tai in hopes that fighting fire with fire can stop the killer from slicing again.

A fun getaway turns into a journey to Hell for some teenage girls visiting an isolated house to rehearse a play for their private movie club. Soon, their food and equipment disappears and one of the girls is haunted by ghostly visions of the masked demon. Someone or something is in the house, and gruesome death awaits those who cannot escape!

She's beautiful, young, and newlywed - yet Yeon-yi finds her world shattered when her husband, Jin-wu, is left in a coma from a brutal accident. When Yeoni-yi meets Jin-wu's twin brother, however, she can't help but fall for him - but good things don't last when Jin-wu awakens from his coma.

This quirky metaphysical tale of "self-multiplication" hits all the trademarks of cult director Satoshi Miki. KAT-TUN pop idol Kazuya Kamenashi stars as Hitoshi, a retail employee whose phone scam accidentally triggers a surreal series of events...

This quirky metaphysical tale of "self-multiplication" hits all the trademarks of cult director Satoshi Miki. KAT-TUN pop idol Kazuya Kamenashi stars as Hitoshi, a retail employee whose phone scam accidentally triggers a surreal series of events which turns more and more people into copies of him. Though initially disoriented by a world inhabited by so many Hitoshis, he begins to find the uncomplicated relationships among "him-selves" quite comfortable.

Three troublesome noble-born friends with no interest in their Confucian studies are thrilled when girls are accepted to study with boys at school. One day, two of the boys get abducted and laid by a mysterious woman at a secluded windmill....

Three troublesome noble-born friends with no interest in their Confucian studies are thrilled when girls are accepted to study with boys at school. One day, two of the boys get abducted and laid by a mysterious woman at a secluded windmill. Though initially elated by this turn of events, the boys are shamed when the woman leaves them to be found tied up in ropes the next day. Unable to tolerate their shameful experience, the three begin to investigate the identity of the mysterious abductress.

The Fukushima nuclear disaster is considered the worst of the 21st century. Watch as seventeen Japanese citizens are granted access to see the impact of the worst nuclear power plant incident in history, Chernobyl, and ponder what the future of Fukushima has in store following these tragic events.

Eun-sook has all the male professors wrapped around her finger - but when Suk-gyu, a popular comic artist, joins the environmental awareness group she belongs to, he attracts the jealousy of Mr. Yoo, a member of her group who harbors a passionate...

Eun-sook has all the male professors wrapped around her finger - but when Suk-gyu, a popular comic artist, joins the environmental awareness group she belongs to, he attracts the jealousy of Mr. Yoo, a member of her group who harbors a passionate but unrequited love for for Eun-sook. Unbeknownst to the rest, Eun-sook and Suk-gyu attended the same junior high school, and hide a tragic secret. But when Mr. Yoo begins looking into the pair's history, their secret is threatened to be uncovered.

The Korean equivalent of Geisha, Gisaeng were an elite class of courtesan of utmost sophistication during the Joseon dynasty. Yet even among such venerated company, Ae-rang stands a step above the rest. A woman of stunning beauty and cunning...

The Korean equivalent of Geisha, Gisaeng were an elite class of courtesan of utmost sophistication during the Joseon dynasty. Yet even among such venerated company, Ae-rang stands a step above the rest. A woman of stunning beauty and cunning intellect, Ae-rang is capable of bringing any man to his knees with a flick of her wrist or a blink of her eyes. The arrival of an impenetrable man, however, will test the limits of Ae-rang's charms as she sets to win a bet, and have him begging for more.

A naive girl mistakenly confuses a Japanese Adult idol with a Japanese pop idol, sparking a racy and raucous series of events for both beauties. Ryoko is in Seoul to film a movie when wannabe Yuna mistakes her for a great Japanese idol and...

A naive girl mistakenly confuses a Japanese Adult idol with a Japanese pop idol, sparking a racy and raucous series of events for both beauties. Ryoko is in Seoul to film a movie when wannabe Yuna mistakes her for a great Japanese idol and follows her to set. There, the director casts her in his erotic movie, and Yuna accepts without knowing what the film is. Ryoko moves heaven and earth not to hurt Yuna's dream, but the moment to shoot the steamy love scene is fast approaching…

In a twisted tale of infidelity, a best-selling author fuels his latest novel with details drawn from his torrid affair with a female college student. His wife, reading the novel, strays deeper into mania.

In a twisted tale of infidelity, a best-selling author fuels his latest novel with details drawn from his torrid affair with a female college student. His wife, reading the novel, strays deeper into mania.
4 kids. 1 life insurance policy. The battle for this dying dad's inheritance gets juicier when the children discover that only one of them is his biological offspring. Who's your daddy?
After losing all her savings towards buying a Yoga studio to conmen, Jee-in meets a handsome cop willing to help her catch the perps.
Jee-in musters up the courage to ask for a loan to keep her dream alive. Yi-baek gets suspended from the police force after the "indecent exposure" complaint.
E-baek professes his love for Ji-in and Mr. Chun's children receive the news of their father's passing.
The family finds out that their dad have a fifth son that must be present to collect the insurance money.
Everyone searches for the missing younger brother - Chun Sang-nam.
A 30 year old secret is finally revealed by E-baek's mom.
Mr. Min and Gang Do-sang conspire together to find a way to take over Mr.Chun's clinic while the siblings are finally starting to get along.
E-baek and Ji-in are having trouble being siblings, while a new clue leads the family closer to Chun Sang-nam.
E-beak and Ji-in go on a trip together alone - causing a small panic amongst the rest of the family.
Ms. Wang has an episode of Alzeimer's and goes missing, forcing Ji-in to revisit true her identity.
Ji-in tries to figure her next move after finding out the truth of her birth. Meanwhile, E-baek's girlfriend is blackmailing Ji-in.
The siblings finally find their missing brother - Sang-nam, who is in need of a bone marrow transplant.
The DNA results are in. The family reunites to look for their older brother.
E-Baek's suspicions reach the tipping point and he investigates his mysterious family tree himself.
The siblings decide whether or not to stay as a family. E-baek confronts Ji-in about their relationship.

Defunct beauty Hye-Jin hasn't been pretty since puberty, and until now, she hasn't really cared. But when her childhood love comes back to town for the first time in 20 years, Hye-jin decides that rather than face him with her current face,...
When Hye-jin's first love reappears many years later, she's afraid to face him. Little does she know, the web of lies she constructs will have consequences.
Hye-jin does everything in her power to prevent Sung-joon from recognizing her. The only problem? They work together.
When Ha-ri runs into Sung-joon, the web of lies surrounding Hye-jin begins to unravel. Meanwhile, Hye-jin learns fashion the hard way.
Hye-jin has to drive Sung-joon to an important interview for the magazine, and everything goes wrong. After drinking her blunders away, Hye-jin says a little too much to Sung-joon on the phone.
When Hye-jin nearly loses the missing piece to Sung-joon's puzzle, will he finally catch on to her secret?
Ha-ri starts to develop real feelings for Sung-joon -- but their relationship is based on a huge lie.
Hye-jin and Sung-joon end up on a business trip together--alone. Will she finally share her secret with him?
Hye-jin makes a mistake at work that the chief considers unforgivable.
After Hye-jin transforms her look, people start to see her differently and take her more seriously.
When Hye-jin discovers Ha-ri's secret, it's time for everyone to know the truth. However, they aren't the only two that have something to reveal.
Now that Sung-joon knows about Hye -jin's web of lies, will he be able to forgive her?
Shin-huk returns to Most magazine and Hye-jin begins to let down her guard with Sung-joon.
The pressure is on for The Most Korea--will they be able to turn around magazine sales before the unit is shut down?
When the main feature interview falls through, the editorial team is left scrambling. A hidden identity is then forced to reveal itself.
With the anniversary edition of The Most finally out on the stands, the magazine's future will soon be known.
After the couple decides to spend a year apart for the sake of following their dreams, Hye-jin and Sung-joon begin to wonder if maybe the distance is too much.
She's fallen nobility, dressed as a boy to sell books on the street . He's a vampire scholar, haunted by the face of his long-lost love. When night falls: anything goes.
Betrothed to his beloved, scholar Sung Yeol unexpectedly joins the undead. Now he must track down the one diary that will destroy Gwi, a bloodthirsty vampire determined to rule the human world.
In the midst of Sung Yeol's search for the lost diary, he discovers that the people are beginning to question the prince's death that took place a decade ago.
While Yang Sun insists on helping Sung Yeol track down the journal, Crown Prince Lee Yoon continues to hunt down all those who defy the crown.
The search for Forbidden Quest heats up, as talk of the sequel attracts more attention. With Prince Sadong's memorial approaching, living in hiding becomes more difficult for Gwi.
As Gwi continues to look for the manuscript, Sung Yeol struggles with how his growing feelings for Yang Sun strike his desire to live as a human.
Yang Sung is reluctant to leave when Sung Yeol sends her away. The king discovers the identity of Forbidden Quest.
Gwi uses innocent people to try and draw out Forbidden Quest, which spurs Sung Yeol to come out of hiding.
Sung Yeol is determined to use the people's sentiment to turn the tide against Gwi. The king hands over the search for Forbidden Quest to the Crown Prince.
Accused of being Forbidden Quest, Yang Sun and her father are imprisoned for treason. Realizing that Yang Sun's life is in danger, Sung Yeol decides to face Gwi.
While Sung Yeol thinks of a way to rescue Yang Sun who is now a palace slave, Crown Prince Lee Yoon does an about face to his ideals as Forbidden Quest.
A potential alliance between Sung Yeol and the Crown Prince is threatened when a hunter's appearance comes between them.
In the final preparations in the fight against Gwi, the king learns of the three crucial clues needed to take down his sworn enemy.
With the prince pushed ahead to lead the fight, Sung Yeol is alarmed when he finds out how much he must sacrifice when it comes to defeating Gwi.
Greatly weakened by being unable to feed, Sung Yeol desperately tries to prevent Yang Sun from being captured.
Now having learned the truth about the secret keys to destroying Gwi, Sung Yeol must rescue Yang Sun before it is too late.
Everyone is taken aback when a new side of Sung Yeol unexpectedly appears. Will Sung Yeol be able to fight his instincts or succumb to his cravings?
Sung Yeol and Yang Sun remain in hiding while Lee Yoon continues his fight against Gwi, who is becoming increasingly impatient with each passing day.
As Gwi assumes power in the kingdom, Sung Yeol feels that the future is bleak, and is encouraged to have faith in humanity.
Gwi decides to bait Lee Yoong into returning to the place. Sung Yeol and the others try to come up with an alternative plan to destroy Gwi.
While making preparations for the last stand against Gwi, everyone involved must be prepared for whatever the outcome is.
A fox demon gets caught in a web of romance, betrayal and magic with a human princess and her heroic lover.
Fox Spirit Xiaowei is sent to the Ice Hell for breaking the fox clan code. Madam Qing sends Cai to the underworld to save the spirit.
Wang Ying is sentenced to prison for a horrible accident.
Cai Que rescues Xiaowei out of the Ice Hell, but the fox spirit's struggle is only beginning.
Wang saves Xiaowei from a rogue, as passionate feelings begin to develop.
Li Jing goes to the frontier searching for Wang Ying. But first, she must escape a brutal army out for vengeance.
An assassination plot develops against a young prince.
Xiaowei is forced to keep her powers a secret as her feelings develop for Li Jing.
A murderous plot against Zheng Ji's mother takes a shocking turn.
A rescue mission builds to a powerful friendship.
Li Jing reflects on the passions and heartbreaks, the dreams and regrets, of her broken past.
Lao Yao makes a blood pact that could have violent consequences.
Will Valentine's Day heat up the passion between Wang and Li?
A spirit is haunting Xiaowei, and it's closer than she could ever imagine.
Xiaowei puts her life on the line to save Wang from death.
A fight breaks out over the heart of Pang Lang.
Li Jing fights off an unwanted marriage to a vicious barbarian.
Xiaowei's mysterious disappearance leads to heartbreak.
Wang is forced to return home to make a life or death exchange.
Zheng Ji voyages to a dangerous frontier filled with murderous bandits to save Li Jing.
Pang Lang begins to fall in love with Cai Que. Will she be able to give her heart?
Xiaowei and Fu Sheng face their differences.
Cai Que makes a life-changing decision.
Romantic tension and jealousy build as Wang looks after Li Jing.
When dead bodies start appearing in the barracks, Wang suspects an evil spirit is behind the murders.
Xiaowei's passion for Wang builds, as her hopes for true love grow dimmer.
Xiaowei is driven by her passions to brutal murder.
A Lian and Zheng Ji head on a dangerous adventure to hunt down murderous demons.
Zheng Ji returns to the Wan Gu Clan.
Wang begins finding the truth of Xiaowei's magical secret.
Xiaowei faces Madam Qing's betrayal.
A gift exchange reveals secrets of the heart.
A Lian's birthday turns from heartbreak to kindness.
Li Jing's scar leads her to hide away from the world.
Xiaowei and Li Jing face an uncertain future.
Madam Qing plots to kill Wang Ying for the life of Xiaowei.
Passions of the heart lead to a fight between Pang and A Lian.
Li Jing's wedding takes an ugly turn.
A tragedy forces Pang to change his life forever.
Zheng Ji blames A Lian for she has no faith in him.
Zheng Ji and Si Tu plot to take over the throne by any means necessary.
Passion and pain come to a head for the Wang/Xiaoshuai/Li love triangle.
From Goryeo girl to Empress of China, this period drama depicts the loves, betrayals, wars, and resolve of the woman who would one day rule the Yuan dynasty.
Sungnyang disguises herself as a man and works to free women who were sent to be Yuan concubines. King Wang-ko orders Sungnyang to get close to Wang-yu to lure him into an ambush.
Sungnyang reveals to the Crown Prince that there is a spy among them. Prince Togon is exiled to Koryo.
Sungnyang mistakes the Yuan Prince for a Yuan soldier. For his protection, the Koryo King barricades the prince within the Koryo palace.
The Yaun Prince asks Sungnyang to teach him how to defend himself. El Temur plans a full-on attack on Daechong Island.
Nyang and Prince Togon continue their way to Kaegyong to find the Koryo King. Meanwhile, El Temur takes Koryo's palace under his command.
Yom falls for Nyangs trick. Prince Togon becomes conflicted about choosing to tell the truth or becoming emperor of Yuan.
The King of Koryo finds out that Sungnyang is a woman. Meanwhile, at the capital of Yuan, Tanasiri is taking lessons to be empress.
Nyang plots to take revenge on Emperor Togon during his wedding ceremony. The King of Koryo and Yom Byongsu are to duel to see who will be commander.
The Koryo King defeats Yom, but is given poor resources to prepare for battle. El Temur is enraged when he finds out the Emperor has taken a concubine.
The Koryo King leads his men to their first victory against the Turks. The Emperor makes Sungnyang a part of his retinue.
The Empress orders Sungnyang to feed Lady Pak a powder that will cause her a miscarriage. The Emperor further suspects Nyang of being Sungnyang.
Nyang is ordered to spread rumors that Lady Pak is faking her pregnancy. General Bayan disguises himself as Batolu.
Lady Pak is brought in front of the inquisition to be reexamined. Nyang receives a written promise to be let out of the palace, but gets caught by the Emperor.
The previous Yuan Emperor is said to have written a blood vow before his death and all are scrambling to find it.
Wang-yu comes up with a plan to infuriate El Temur, but needs Nyang to accomplish it. The Emperor challenges Wang-yu to a soccer match.
Wang-yu finds out that Nyang was the one to help and decides to not see her again.
The Emperor and the Queen Dowager ask Wang-yu if he is interested in marrying one of the princesses. The Emperor opens a shadow play for Yang.
The palace fills with rats and begin the curse of the late Khan. The emperor decides to actively search for the Blood Vow.
Wangyu and Yeonchul comes up with a plan to fake Yeonchul's death and find out who are loyal to him.
Wangyu meets with the Dowager and wins her trust. Wangyu asks Nyang if she wants to be his Queen once he goes back to Koryo.
Wang-yu receives permission from the Regent to return to Koguryo to visit his "sick" father. Nyang and two others stay behind to look for Jukho.
The emperor decides to hide the injured Nyang in the pavilion so the regent's men cannot find her.
Nyang gives birth to a son with a unique dot on his feet. The emperor and Wang-yu finds out about Nyang and plans his revenge against the empress.
Nyang is found by Bayan in Liaoyang province while she is being sold as a slave. Nyang discovers the blood vow and shows it to Bayan.
Nyang begins the selection process for the consorts as she fights through the obstacles the empress set up.
Nyang becomes a consort and begins to fight with the empress with the support of other people from Koryo.
Nyang begins to teach the Emperor how to read and write every night by disguising it as a party. The empress gives Nyang an impossible task.
Nyang begins her plan to usurp the empress' power. Wangyu meets with Hukso to get Musong back.
Wang-yu finds out about Nyang's situation from Tal Tal after they arrest Huksu. Nyang continues her revenge on the Empress.
The Emperor speaks in front of El Temur and shows him that he can read. Tal Tal brings the spies from Eagle House in front of the governors.
Nyang avoids the bullet from El Temur and frames another governor as the culprit of the attempted assassination of the Prince.
Nyang and the Emperor survive the coup but the Emperor is shot by a poison arrow. Wang Yu gets stabbed in the process of helping Nyang run away from the guards.
The Emperor comes to save Nyang and her servants from being punished. The Empress decides to use a curse to try and kill Nyang.
After Nyang recovers the talisman and breaks the curse, El Temur begins to have nightmares. Wangyu begins to train Wongjin's new recruits.
Bayan begins his plan to go to war with El Temur and marches to the capitol. El Temur receives word from his men that his son won the war.
Wang-yu returns to Koryo and takes command by refusing to provide for Yuan any longer. Bayan takes his men to war with surrounding countries and tries to take them over.
The Dowager and Bayan frames Wang-yu of selling explosives to enemy states of Yuan. Wang-yu is stripped of his title and dragged to Yuan by the prince and Tanguishi.
Wang Yu visits Maha and decides that he is going to take him to Koyro and tell him everything. The Eagle House wants Yom Byung-soo to go see Bayan.
Nyang keeps the Emperor locked up in her room so that no one will know that he is awake. Bayan is sent to prison for trying to kill Nyang and her son Ayu.
Nyang is sent to the temple to repent for her sins and ask for forgiveness. Wang-yu sends all the grains he bought to the palace to distribute to the people.
Nyang finally becomes the Empress of Yuan and Wang-yu gains his throne. Nyang is trying to find out about the Eagle House and confiscate their assets.
Nyang and Wangyu finally meet together and go their own ways. Feisu finally completes deciphering the book they found in Huksu's house.
Nyang must figure out how to defend the Emperor as Bayan storms the Ice Palace.
As Bayan Hudu becomes the new empress, Nyang and Wang Yu both separately continue searching for the secret funds.
Nyang finally finds the secret funds El Temur has been collecting. Bayan announces to the Emperor that he wants to conquer surrounding countries.
The Dowager opposes Nayng becoming the empress and makes Bayan bring his niece to run Nyang out.
Nyang and Wangyu begins their plan to remove the money from El Temur's house. Tal Tal finds out that he has been tricked by Nyang and rushes back to see the secret room empty.
Kim Sunju comes right on time to save Wang Yu and his servants. The Emperor breaks the promise with Nyang and start to drink again.
The Empress uncovers the secret Maha's birth by threatening Yon Hwa. Nyang tells the Dowager and Maha that she will reveal all the secrets soon.
Nyang runs to save Maha's life after finding out that he is her real son. Maha's true identity is revealed and he is kicked out of the palace.
Showcasing mouth-watering delicacies with state-of-the-art cinematography, this is the quintessential docu-series on the soulful world of Chinese cuisine.
Episode one features Pickled pork simmered with bamboo shoots from Zhejiang, deep-fried lotus root sandwich from Hubei, boiled "bullet mackerel" with pickled cabbage from Hainan & more.
As Chinese street food is sweeping across major cities like New York - see how the originals are made. Featuring famous spicy "Rou Jia Mo" burgers of Xi'an, Lanzhou beef noodles and much more.
Learn about the history and uses of Chinese food staples like tofu, Shaoxing wine, soy sauce and Mongolian milk tea.
Get the insider's scoop on popular preserved delicacies like Chinese kimchi, Chinese sausage, Jinhua ham and shrimp paste.
Featuring dishes like the boiler chicken from Kunming, steamed pork buns from Yangzhou, sweet and sour fish from Hangzhou & more.

titles.title: A Perfect Blend of Five Flavors

descriptions.description: This episode focuses on some of the most well known dishes that represent the complexity of flavors in Chinese cuisine, such as Mapo Tofu, Spicy Hot Pot, Salt Baked Chicken, Orange Duck and more.
Suffering breakup after breakup, makeup artist Mijoo goes on a multitude of dates to find her soul mate and success in the world of fashion.

After being dumped by her boyfriend on their 1000thday anniversary, TV makeup artist Gong Mijoo embarks on a search for her perfect prince. Mijoo becomes entangled with the wrong crowd when her new "puppy" is revealed to be an unemployed robber.
Continuing her search for a better job and a "prince", Gong Mijoo is persuaded by a producer to work as a makeup artist on his upcoming film, her very own Mr. Big!
Gong Mijoo and Yoo Junghwa clamor for the affections of stuntmen-turned-models on the new set at work. Gong Mijoo is swept off of her feet (literally) by one of the tough guys.
Gong Mijoo tries her hand at dating a famous playboy while balancing stress at work. She struggles to convince both him and her clients to settle down.

In an effort to redeem her prior outburst at work, Mijoo handles the guest list for a major make-up conference. When she hits it off with one of the movie star guests, Mijoo is swept up into a world of fame and dazzling lights.
When Mi-joo refuses the advances of an old acquaintance and finds herself in trouble, her worried boss comes to her rescue.
After risking his life to save Mi-joo, Min-ji spends quality time with her, deepening their bond of affection.
Min Ji Suk's ex-wife is back in the picture while Mijoo goes soul searching.
